item.title: SmolWhisper ‚Äî Lightweight Multilingual ASR
item.description: Overview SmolWhisper is a lightweight yet powerful Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) model built on top of the Whisper architecture. Designed for efficiency without sacrificing accuracy, it’s perfect for resource-constrained environments. üîß Tech Stack PyTorch - Deep learning framework HuggingFace Transformers - Model architecture and tokenization FlashAttention - Optimized attention mechanism DDP (Distributed Data Parallel) - Multi-GPU training WGAN - Data augmentation ‚ú® Key Features High-Efficiency Training Trained on 250+ hours of GigaSpeech dataset Multi-GPU Distributed Data Parallel (DDP) for scalable training 35% faster convergence compared to baseline Advanced Optimization FlashAttention integration for memory-efficient attention bfloat16 precision training for reduced compute overhead WGAN-based data augmentation for enhanced training stability Production Ready Scalable pipelines for multilingual speech recognition Noise-robust transcription capabilities Lightweight model size (30M parameters) suitable for edge deployment üìä Results Metric Performance Model Size 30M parameters Training Data 250+ hrs GigaSpeech Convergence Speed 35% faster Precision bfloat16 üîó Links GitHub Repository

item.title: Interpretable Deep Learning for GI Endoscopic Image Classification
item.description: üìö Publication Biomedical Physics & Engineering Express (IOP Publishing) Overview This research focuses on making deep learning models interpretable for medical diagnosis, specifically for gastrointestinal (GI) endoscopic image classification. üî¨ Research Contributions Interpretable AI for Healthcare Applied EfficientNet architecture for multi-class GI diagnosis Integrated Grad-CAM for visual explanations of model decisions Implemented LIME (Local Interpretable Model-agnostic Explanations) Achieved transparent multi-class diagnosis Key Innovations Combined state-of-the-art accuracy with interpretability Enabled clinicians to understand model reasoning Validated on real-world endoscopic image datasets üéØ Impact This work bridges the gap between high-performing deep learning models and clinical adoption by providing transparent, interpretable diagnoses that healthcare professionals can trust and verify.

item.title: Skin Sprite ‚Äî AI Dermatology Analysis
item.description: üèÜ Award-Winning Project Winner at HackBytes 2.0, IIIT Jabalpur - An AI-powered dermatology analysis system that surpassed existing solutions in diagnostic efficiency. Overview Skin Sprite is an intelligent dermatology assistant that uses computer vision and deep learning to analyze skin conditions. Built during a 24-hour hackathon, it demonstrates the power of AI in healthcare diagnostics. üîß Tech Stack Deep Learning - CNN-based image classification Computer Vision - Image preprocessing and augmentation Python - Backend development Streamlit/FastAPI - Web interface ‚ú® Key Features Accurate Diagnosis Multi-class skin lesion classification High diagnostic accuracy rivaling existing solutions Confidence scoring for predictions User-Friendly Interface Easy image upload for analysis Instant results with detailed explanations Medical disclaimer and guidance Production Ready Optimized inference for real-time analysis Scalable architecture for deployment Privacy-focused - no data retention üîó Links Devfolio Project GitHub Repository

item.title: DermaPixie ‚Äî Skin Lesion Classifier
item.description: üèÜ Award-Winning Project Winner at TechMinds Hackathon, IIT Janakpuri - A computer vision model achieving 98.5% diagnostic accuracy in skin lesion classification. Overview DermaPixie is a state-of-the-art skin lesion classification system that leverages advanced computer vision techniques to achieve near-expert level diagnostic accuracy. üîß Tech Stack PyTorch/TensorFlow - Deep learning framework EfficientNet - Backbone architecture OpenCV - Image processing Grad-CAM - Model interpretability ‚ú® Key Features State-of-the-Art Accuracy 98.5% diagnostic accuracy on test dataset Multi-class classification covering various skin conditions Robust to image quality variations Interpretable AI Grad-CAM visualizations showing model attention Confidence scores for each prediction Explainable results for medical professionals Technical Excellence Transfer learning from ImageNet pretrained models Data augmentation for improved generalization Optimized for mobile deployment üìä Results Metric Performance Accuracy 98.
